pinyin: Guang3 dong1 Wai4 yu3 Wai4 mao4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: He graduated from Xi'an international university , the Department of Foreign Languages English majors.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于西安外事学院，外语系英语专业。

sentences.english: The testing of FL has witnessed two periods of development: that of code-based testing first and then that of structure-based testing.
sentences.chinese: 外语测试经历了以语码为纲和以结构为纲的两个时期。

sentences.english: Have experience or understand a foreign language is preferred .
sentences.chinese: 有经验或懂一门外语者优先。

sentences.english: Learn English to server our nation country.
sentences.chinese: 学好外语是为了更好的建设祖国。

sentences.english: Finally, the implications of the studies on critical period are explored.
sentences.chinese: 最后探讨了关键期研究对外语学习和教学的启示。

sentences.english: Nominated for Oscar Best Foreign Language Film in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 本片荣获1998年奥斯卡最佳外语片提名。

sentences.english: University student Kicked Out OfSchoolFor Censuring Foreign LanguageEducation?
sentences.chinese: 炮轰外语教育大学生被开除？

sentences.english: Traditional methods of learning a foreign language die hard.
sentences.chinese: 我们难改学习一门外语的传统方法。

sentences.english: Verizon provides products and services in foreign languages.
sentences.chinese: 弗莱森电讯公司提供有外语说明的产品及外语服务。

sentences.english: Verizon provides products and services in foreign languages.
sentences.chinese: 弗莱森电讯公司提供有外语说明的产品及外语服务。

sentences.english: People who want to improve their English levels in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 想在短时刻内进步外语水平的各界人士。

sentences.english: Life is a foreign language: All men mispronounce it.
sentences.chinese: 生活是一门外语，谁都不能发好它的音。

sentences.english: With more and more frequent international contact, more and more Chinese are learning English.
sentences.chinese: 随着国际交往日益频繁，中国人学外语的也日渐增多。

sentences.english: The role of the mother tongue in FLL has caught much attention of researchers.
sentences.chinese: 母语在外语学习中的作用一直备受关注。

sentences.english: Certificate of foreign language proficiency-original and one copy.
sentences.chinese: 外语水平证明原件及复印件。

sentences.english: The British are quite likely to learn foreign languages but tend not to be well-travelled.
sentences.chinese: 英国人非常喜欢学外语，但却并不爱旅游。

definition: abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
